template.description: Executes commands from Kafka on the MSSQL and returns results to Kafka.
template.name: BBTV_Provisioning

labels.label:
Send to Kafka topic 'requests' as JSON : - rrn - operator - command - agreement
Receive from Kafka topic 'responses' as CSV : - - multiple different parameters

entry.value: select '${rrn}' as rrn, * from dbo.UserAndEnddate WHERE sfz = '${agreement}'
